Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1614.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to extend the boundaries of the Toiyabe National Forest in Nevada, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends the boundaries of the Toiyabe National Forest, in Nevada, to include specified lands at Mount Diablo, Meridian, Nevada. Removes the existing limitation of $12,500,000 on funds available for the acquisition of property in the area.

titles.title: A bill to extend the boundaries of the Toiyabe National Forest in Nevada, and for other purposes.
